string.name: button_loading_content_description
string.translation_description: Accessibility label for a loading button

string.name: preview_edit_screen_label
string.translation_description: Name of the screen that lets the user preview their recordings

string.name: dismiss_btn_a11y_action_label
string.translation_description: Label read to a11y users to dismiss video preview.

string.name: share_btn_a11y_action_label
string.translation_description: Label read to a11y users to share

string.name: record_btn_start_a11y_action_label
string.translation_description: Label read to a11y users to start recording

string.name: record_btn_stop_a11y_action_label
string.translation_description: Label read to a11y users to start recording

string.name: generic_error_snackbar_message
string.translation_description: Message that appears in the toast when an error has occurred

resources.string: 系统出问题 请再试一次

string.name: link_button_tap_while_recording_snackbar_error_message
string.translation_description: Message that appears in the toast when a link button is tapped while the user is recording.

string.name: progress_indicator_content_description
string.translation_description: Accessibility label for an indeterminate loading indicator

string.name: microphone_permission_required_snackbar_error_message
string.translation_description: Message that appears in the toast when user attempts to record nad has not given microphone permission

resources.string: 给予麦克风使用权来开始拍摄

string.name: initial_tutorial_message
string.translation_description: Message that appears in AR view when camera first opens

string.name: placement_tutorial_message
string.translation_description: Message that appears in AR view to remind the user to pont the camera at the wedding card

resources.string: 请把喜帖摆置在相机前

string.name: image_detected_message
string.translation_description: Message that appears in AR view when an image is detected

string.name: record_button_generic_error_message
string.translation_description: Message that appears in AR view when the record button is tapped
